Package kodingProject

Class SteamGames

java.lang.Object
kodingProject.Game
kodingProject.SteamGames
public class SteamGames
extends Game
This is a SteamGames Class for retrieving additional details "product ID", "Game Image", "Game Description", "Summary Review" & "Game Release Date", "Price" & " list of Steam Game Reviews"
Author:
Chang Hua, Zhan An, Wei Xiang, Jing Wei
